mapper.select: select user_id, username,nick_name, dept_id, password, enabled,email, phone, language,is_admin from sys_user where user_id = #{userId}
select user_id, username,nick_name, dept_id, password, enabled,email, phone, language ,is_admin from sys_user where username = #{username}

SELECT sys_menu.permission FROM ( SELECT GET_V_AUTH_MODEL_ID_P_USE ( #{userId}, 'menu' ) cids ) t, sys_menu WHERE FIND_IN_SET( sys_menu.menu_id, cids ) UNION ALL SELECT plugin_sys_menu.permission FROM ( SELECT GET_V_AUTH_MODEL_ID_P_USE ( #{userId}, 'menu' ) cids ) t, plugin_sys_menu WHERE FIND_IN_SET( plugin_sys_menu.menu_id, cids )
select srm.menu_id from sys_roles_menus srm left join sys_users_roles sur on sur.role_id = srm.role_id where sur.user_id = #{userId}
select r.role_id, r.name from sys_role r left join sys_users_roles sur on sur.role_id = r.role_id where sur.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT sys_menu.permission FROM sys_menu UNION ALL SELECT plugin_sys_menu.permission FROM plugin_sys_menu
